mapper.select: select zsps.*, zps.category AS category, zps.vehicle_name AS vehicleName, zvm.model_name AS modelName, zps.is_active AS isActive, zps.setting_name AS settingName, zps.model_id AS modelId, zps.battery_count AS batteryCount from zc_shop_price_setting AS zsps LEFT JOIN zc_price_setting AS zps ON zsps.price_setting_id = zps.id LEFT JOIN zc_vehicle_model AS zvm ON zps.model_id = zvm.id where zsps.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into zc_shop_price_setting ( agent_id, agent_name, agent_code, shop_id, shop_name, price_setting_id, create_time, vehicle_count ) VALUES ( #{agentId}, #{agentName}, #{agentCode}, #{shopId}, #{shopName}, #{priceSettingId}, #{createTime}, #{vehicleCount} )
